EmailTemplate.name: MMAdManagerRejectionNotification
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: AD {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is rejected by Manager
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.OwnerFirstName},
The Script - {!ADvendio__BriefingScript__c.Name} is rejected by manager - {!User.Manager} you need to rework on the AD and resend the AD for approval.
Sincerely, ADvendio Team
